GET /zones/{zone_id}/schema_validation/s.description: Retrieves all operations from the schema. Operations that already exist in API Shield Endpoint Management will be returned as full operations.

parameters.description: Add feature(s) to the results. The feature name that is given here corresponds to the resulting feature object. Have a look at the top-level object description for more details on the specific meaning.
parameters.name: feature

schema.description: Filter results to only include the specified hosts.
Filter results to only include the specified HTTP methods.
Filter results to only include endpoints containing this pattern.

parameters.description: Maximum number of results per page.
parameters.name: per_page

parameters.description: Filter results by whether operations exist in Web Asset Management or not. `new` will just return operations from the schema that do not exist otherwise. `existing` will just return operations from the schema that already exist.
parameters.name: operation_status

success.description: Whether the API call was successful.

count.description: Total number of results for the requested service.

page.description: Current page within paginated list of results.

per_page.description: Number of results per page of results.

total_count.description: Total results available without any search parameters.

endpoint.description: The endpoint which can contain path parameter templates in curly braces, each will be replaced from left to right with {varN}, starting with {var1}, during insertion. This will further be Cloudflare-normalized upon insertion. See: https://developers.cloudflare.com/rules/normalization/how-it-works/.

method.description: The HTTP method used to access the endpoint.

auth_id_tokens.description: The total number of auth-ids seen across this calculation.

data_points.description: The number of data points used for the threshold suggestion calculation.

p50.description: The p50 quantile of requests (in period_seconds).

p90.description: The p90 quantile of requests (in period_seconds).

p99.description: The p99 quantile of requests (in period_seconds).

period_seconds.description: The period over which this threshold is suggested.

requests.description: The estimated number of requests covered by these calculations.

suggested_threshold.description: The suggested threshold in requests done by the same auth_id or period_seconds.

parameter_schemas.description: An operation schema object containing a response.

parameters.description: Sufficient requests have been observed for this parameter to provide high confidence in this parameter schema.
parameters.name: var1

parameters.description: An array containing the learned parameter schemas.

example.description: Sufficient requests have been observed for this parameter to provide high confidence in this parameter schema.
example.name: var1

responses.description: An empty response object. This field is required to yield a valid operation schema.

p90.description: Upper and lower bound for percentile estimate

p95.description: Upper and lower bound for percentile estimate

p99.description: Upper and lower bound for percentile estimate

learned_available.description: True if a Cloudflare-provided learned schema is available for this endpoint.

mitigation_action.description: Action taken on requests failing validation.

endpoint.description: The endpoint which can contain path parameter templates in curly braces, each will be replaced from left to right with {varN}, starting with {var1}, during insertion. This will further be Cloudflare-normalized upon insertion. See: https://developers.cloudflare.com/rules/normalization/how-it-works/.

method.description: The HTTP method used to access the endpoint.
